title: MC_AddAxisToGroup (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_AddAxisToGroup
This function block adds one axis to an axis group.
If the state of the axis group is not
GroupDisabled
, an error
is created and the axis is not added to the group.
When enabling the axis group, the first n axes added to the group
will be the axes of the kinematics. All subsequently added axes are
additional axes.
This is an administrative FB, since no movement is generated.
The command cannot be buffered.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows: Reference to the axis to be added

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Start the grouping process at the rising edge

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
